items.name: Composite Dropship Recall Beacon
items.description: The Composite Dropship Recall Beacon will fire a flare that calls the Prospectors dropship to that location when thrown, which can either be used for immediate extraction or left there for use later on. Multiple Recall Beacons can be used per session, however, these are one-use items, so use them carefully. Items stored in the dropships inventory will not be lost when the dropship is called, allowing Prospectors to transport equipment/resources over large distances.

items.name: Makeshift Landmine
items.description: Prospectorsonmounts and mounts themselves do not trigger Landmines. Prospectors, however, can trigger and detonate Landmines with a Yellow/Red indicator. All Landmines can be picked up and disarmed, regardless of their current state. Press and hold X to pickup and disarm Landmines.Note:once triggered, Makeshift Landmines will detonate if a Prospector/animal (excluding mounts) is nearby. They can be picked up and disarmed, but Prospectors run the risk of detonating the Landmine.

items.name: Miner's Module
items.description: This module is theWorkshopequivalent of theSupplemental Respiration Attachment, with the added damage bonus toCaveworms. It can be researched and crafted on theSpace Stationin theWorkshop. Multiple Miner's Modules may be equipped if the Prospector has available slots on their Envirosuit and will further increase benefits received from the modules.

items.name: Prototype Trail Beacon
items.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon is a small portable self-powered beacon that is deployed with thePrototype Trail Beacon Toolto form a breadcrumb trail in the uncharted areas of theNull Sector RegiononPrometheus.

items.name: Prototype Trail Beacon Tool
items.description: The Prototype Trail Beacon Tool is a handheld device used to place a breadcrumb trail ofPrototype Trail Beaconswhen exploring theNull Sector Regionon thePrometheusmap.

items.name: Scorpion Pincer Trap
items.description: Scorpion Pincer Traps are sturdy defenses used around your base or while at objectives for protection of equipment. The recipe blueprint to craft this defensive trap is only unlocked after completing the prospectCarapace: Research. The blueprint unlocks account-wide once the mission is completed.

items.name: Snare Trap
items.description: The Snare Trap is a deployable item used to trap and tame certain animals on Icarus. It must be filled with suitableAnimal Baitand placed in an area to attract the desired animal.

base_recipe.crafted_at: Craft Baits at the Ranching Station
